name: Decrypt (Gabriel Chan, okshirl, BhanHG)
description:
Note: Play in full screen for more accurate control!

Decrypt is a word game where you play as a cybersecurity program to defend against hacks (scrambled words sent to mess up your system D:). The main goal is to unscramble as many words as possible, before the word drops overflow. The word drops will be sent every 10 seconds, so be ready to decrypt them as soon as they appear!

When you reach a certain score, 2 hacks will be presented for you to choose. These are abilities that will help you defend against the attacks. But be careful, each ability also comes with a disadvantage, consider the consequences before you pick. Good luck

Controls: Use left clicks to drag letters around. Use right clicks to use ability. Comment with a screenshot of your highscore!

Game made for LudumDare 51.
By Gabriel Chan, Chan Gim and Shirley Yang
